arg.name: scanner_list
arg.tp:docstring:
The list of attached scanners. Returns a dict keyed by the string name of the device, which can be passed as the first argument to the "ScanImage" call. For each device, the possible dict keys are:
Manufacturer (string): Name of the manufacturer of the device. Model (string): Model name of the device. Type (string): Type of device (e.g, "flatbed scanner").

method.name: GetScannerCapabilities
method.tp:docstring: Returns the supported capabilities for scanner |device_name|.

method.name: ScanImage
method.tp:docstring: Initiates a scan on |device_name|, and output PNG data to |outfd|.
Output file descriptor. PNG image data will be written to this fd.

A dict of key-value pairs which define parameters of the scan. Accepted keys are.
Mode (string): Capture mode (can be "Color", "Gray", "Lineart".) Resolution (uint32): Image resolution in DPI.
